body:
~$ sudo /etc/init.d/clamav-daemon start 
Starting ClamAV daemon: clamd ERROR: Unknown group 20 Incorrect number of 
arguments 
 failed! 
 
After latest upgrade. Anyone have a quick fix? 
 
 
--

subject: New Clamav-daemon Error
